vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Kimley-Horn and Associates, Inc. for the development of a Security Master Plan for Dallas Water Utilities - Not to exceed $2,500,000.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($1,500,000.00) and Wastewater Construction Fund ($1,000,000.00)
